alert.note: Alert for Flat Tops; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Upper Yampa River Basin; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 2:40PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Wind gusts of 45 to 65 mph will be possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Upper Yampa River Basin, Grand and Battlement Mesas, West Elk and Sawatch Mountains and Flat Tops. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From late Tuesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops and mountain passes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest wind gusts over 50 mph could occur mainly above 10000 feet early Wednesday morning through the afternoon hours.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Upper Yampa River Basin; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
